K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-092:473a-1: pradzny'a bardha ni n'a ma dh'a ra n'i /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-092:473a-3: shes rab bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-092:473a-4: thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-092:473a-5: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-092:473b-0: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i blo ldan zhes @473b bya ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-092:473b-1: ri rab kyi ngos la bzhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-092:473b-2: ri rab la gnas pa'i lha'i bu thams cad kyis bskor nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-092:473b-3: mdun du byas te chos ston to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-092:473b-4: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhon nu'i gzugs can gyis thal mo sbyar te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-092:473b-5: byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan la gsol ba btab pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-092:473b-6: bcom ldan 'das sems can shes rab rtul ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-092:473b-8: yid mi gzhungs pa rnams kyi slad du shes rab bskyed pa zhas bya ba'i gzungs bshad du gsol bshad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-092:473b-9: h'um pi tsu pi tsu pra dzny'a bardha ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-092:473b-10: dzva la dzva la me dha bardha ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-092:473b-13: gang zhig gzungs 'di klog pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-092:473b-16: kun chub par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-092:473b-17: chung ngu yang yi ge 'bru gcig tsam thos na yang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-092:473b-18: tshe 'di nyid la shes rab chen por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-092:473b-19: gang gis zla ba drug gi bar du nyin re zhing rtsabs khyor gang la rigs pa 'di lan bdun btab ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-092:473b-20: nyi ma shar ba'i tshe 'thungs na tshigs su bcad pa stong 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-092:473b-21: lan gcig 'thungs na lnga brgya 'dzin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-092:473b-22: nyin gcig bzhin du shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-092:473b-23: nyin re bzhin du brjod pa tsam gyis dran pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-092:473b-25: shes rab bskyed pa'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
